turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order three medium meat lovers' pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good morning, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With gluten-free crust from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where do you want to order those from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for 3 medium meat lover pizzas with gluten free crust is $36.99. did you want me to place the order for pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. No, that would be all. Thank you, goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll be ready in 45 mins.
